extendedInfo.description: Wondering if your newbornâs getting enough to eat? Sleeping enough? Growing and hitting milestones fast enough? Make the most of every amazing moment of your little oneâs first 12 months with the FREE What to Expect Baby Tracker â your mobile partner in parenting. Stay on top of your babyâs development and pick up pointers on baby care and behavior with this new app from Heidi Murkoffâs best-selling parenting guide, What to Expect the First Year. At home or on-the-go, youâll find everything you need to know to help you make the most of your baby's first year â right at your fingertips. Youâll get: â¢ A month-by-month guide to baby development and behavior â¢ Practical advice on baby care, doctor visits, colic, and more â¢Ideas for games and activities, no matter how old your baby is â¢ Access to the What to Expect message boards so you can get support and ideas from other baby mamas (and dads) â¢ And much, much more!Download the free Baby Tracker today so you can start feeling like a pro in all things baby. And join Heidi and a whole community of other new moms and dads â and their babiesâ at WhatToExpect.com

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Good information.... every loving parent should have this app and the updates makes watching your little one grow just that more exciting. Especially for those experiencing their first one.....this is a must have.
reviews.author: William Hall

reviews.title: Tracker doesn\'t work!!!
reviews.comment: Useless as the tracker isn\'t available. I had this app on my iPhone and loved its simplicity, but apparently the Android app doesn\'t feature the only useful function of the app - the baby tracker!
reviews.author: Susanne Cartledge

reviews.title: Not what I expected
reviews.comment: This app has some great info but its not a tracker by any means. I was looking for something to track her pees, poops, and feedings which this doesn\'t do.
reviews.author: Lacey Prager

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Your app isn\'t good enough to warrant ads especially when the only thing that semi-functioned on the app doesnt work at all now since youve added them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Don\'t install it won\'t move past the main screen then keeps foreclosing on me th\tKeeps foreclosing . Takes a long time to open n move past the main screen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: I\'m uninstalling this and reinstalling the pregnancy countdown WTE app. I want my home board to be more easily accessible instead of having to scroll through everything every time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bugs
reviews.comment: Too many bugs. Doesn\'t automatically refresh comments like it should in the forums. When I turn my phone a different way, it takes me to the home screen for no reason.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force close
reviews.comment: Great info content if app would stay open. Kicks me out every time if I go to main site or read articles. Annoying.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What, no tracker?!?
reviews.comment: I used this app religiously on my iPhone to track my baby\'s feedings, diaper changes, and vaccines, and I\'m super disappointed now that the android app doesn\'t do any of those things.   I would only give one star, but you do have good information in the app.
reviews.author: Marshall Robinson

reviews.title: works except for the community page
reviews.comment: every time i go to reply in the community page it has an error and never sends it. and the photos are always sideways when i go to post one. fox the errors and it will be a great app
reviews.author: Laura salcido

reviews.title: Worst error message
reviews.comment: You really ought to reconsider your error message when the app force closes.  \"Unfortunarely pregnancy has stopped\" is pretty bad for a pregnancy tracker app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Doesnt work. Stays stuck on first page. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible!
reviews.comment: All of a sudden it wouldn\'t allow me to go past the first page and also kept force closing. Such a shame, its an amazing app otherwise. Also its not a tracker. Just info and a forum!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: This app doesn\'t work. Won\'t let me get passed the first page. Please fix so I can use it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Baby Tracker with no Tracking
reviews.comment: The app provides great tips and info, but does not have a tracker like its iphone counterpart!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I like .
reviews.comment: Great app! Now I don\'t have to look it up lol
reviews.author: Evelyn Castro

reviews.title: Force closes all the time!
reviews.comment: Force closes constantly, doesn\'t update threads. Basically awful. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: can\'t enter app
reviews.comment: there is no submit or enter button. I just get the first login page. So annoying
reviews.author: Misha Theron

reviews.title: Fail.
reviews.comment: Doesnt even go the the page , suckss if i cud id give it a zero star
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force closes
reviews.comment: Now with the new update it won\'t allow me to even open the app. Fix this!
reviews.author: A Google User
